verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֖ית <WH7225> In the beginning בָּרָ֣א <WH1254> created אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God אֵ֥ת <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> the heaven וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> And the earth הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> was תֹ֙הוּ֙ <WH8414> without form וָבֹ֔הוּ <WH922> and void וְחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> and darkness עַל־ <WH5921> upon פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [was] upon the face תְה֑וֹם <WH8415> of the deep וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God מְרַחֶ֖פֶת <WH7363> moved עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the face הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of the waters
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God יְהִ֣י <WH1961> Let there be א֑וֹר <WH216> light וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> and there was light

וַיַּ֧רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> הָא֖וֹר <WH216> the light כִּי־ <WH3588> that ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [it was] good וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל <WH914> separated אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and God בֵּ֥ין <WH996> from הָא֖וֹר <WH216> the light וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> from הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> the darkness

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> And God לָאוֹר֙ <WH216> the light י֔וֹם <WH3117> Day וְלַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> and the darkness קָ֣רָא <WH7121> he called לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> Night וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was עֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> and the morning י֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> were the first פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God יְהִ֥י <WH1961> Let there be רָקִ֖יעַ <WH7549> Let there be a firmament בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of the waters וִיהִ֣י <WH1961> become מַבְדִּ֔יל <WH914> and let it divide בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among מַ֖יִם <WH4325> the waters לָמָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> from the waters

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made אֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָקִיעַ֒ <WH7549> the firmament וַיַּבְדֵּ֗ל <WH914> and divided בֵּ֤ין <WH996> among הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the waters אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> [were] under לָרָקִ֔יעַ <WH7549> the firmament וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> from הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> from the waters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> [were] above לָרָקִ֑יעַ <WH7549> the firmament וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> and it was so

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> called אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> And God לָֽרָקִ֖יעַ <WH7549> the firmament שָׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> Heaven וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was עֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> and the morning י֥וֹם <WH3117> day שֵׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> were the second פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> And God יִקָּו֨וּ <WH6960> be gathered together הַמַּ֜יִם <WH4325> Let the waters מִתַּ֤חַת <WH8478> Thahash הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> under the heaven אֶל־ <WH413> unto מָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one וְתֵרָאֶ֖ה <WH7200> [land] appear הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> and let the dry וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> And God לַיַּבָּשָׁה֙ <WH3004> the dry אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> [land] Earth וּלְמִקְוֵ֥ה <WH4723> and the gathering together הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> of the waters קָרָ֣א <WH7121> called יַמִּ֑ים <WH3220> he Seas וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God כִּי־ <WH3588> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> that [it was] good

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> And God תַּֽדְשֵׁ֤א <WH1876> bring forth הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> Let the earth דֶּ֔שֶׁא <WH1877> grass עֵ֚שֶׂב <WH6212> the herb מַזְרִ֣יעַ <WH2232> yielding זֶ֔רַע <WH2233> seed עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree פְּרִ֞י <WH6529> [and] the fruit עֹ֤שֶׂה <WH6213> yielding פְּרִי֙ <WH6529> fruit לְמִינ֔וֹ <WH4327> after his kind אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose זַרְעוֹ־ <WH2233> seed ב֖וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> [is] in itself upon the earth וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַתּוֹצֵ֨א <WH3318> brought forth הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> And the earth דֶּ֠שֶׁא <WH1877> grass עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> [and] herb מַזְרִ֤יעַ <WH2232> yielding זֶ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> seed לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <WH4327> after his kind וְעֵ֧ץ <WH6086> and the tree עֹֽשֶׂה־ <WH6213> yielding פְּרִ֛י <WH6529> fruit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> with זַרְעוֹ־ <WH2233> whose seed ב֖וֹ לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <WH4327> [was] in itself after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God כִּי־ <WH3588> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> that [it was] good
וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> there was עֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> and the morning י֥וֹם <WH3117> day שְׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> were the third פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> And God יְהִ֤י <WH1961> become מְאֹרֹת֙ <WH3974> Let there be lights בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <WH7549> in the firmament הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the heaven לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <WH914> to divide בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> the day וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> from הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> from the night וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> them be for לְאֹתֹת֙ <WH226> and let them be for signs וּלְמ֣וֹעֲדִ֔ים <WH4150> and for seasons וּלְיָמִ֖ים <WH3117> and for days וְשָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> and years

וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> them be for לִמְאוֹרֹת֙ <WH3974> And let them be for lights בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <WH7549> in the firmament הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the heaven לְהָאִ֖יר <WH215> to give light עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> two הַמְּאֹרֹ֖ת <WH3974> lights הַגְּדֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> great אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּא֤וֹר <WH3974> light הַגָּדֹל֙ <WH1419> the greater לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <WH4475> to rule הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> the day וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּא֤וֹר <WH3974> light הַקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> and the lesser לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <WH4475> to rule הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> the night וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הַכּוֹכָבִֽים׃ <WH3556> [he made] the stars

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> set אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <WH7549> them in the firmament הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the heaven לְהָאִ֖יר <WH215> to give light עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth

וְלִמְשֹׁל֙ <WH4910> And to rule בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> over the day וּבַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and over the night וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <WH914> and to divide בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among הָא֖וֹר <WH216> the light וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> from הַחֹ֑שֶׁךְ <WH2822> from the darkness וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God כִּי־ <WH3588> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> that [it was] good
וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> there was עֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> and the morning י֥וֹם <WH3117> day רְבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7243> were the fourth פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God יִשְׁרְצ֣וּ <WH8317> bring forth abundantly הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> Let the waters שֶׁ֖רֶץ <WH8318> the moving creature נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> that hath חַיָּ֑ה <WH2416> life וְעוֹף֙ <WH5775> and fowl יְעוֹפֵ֣ף <WH5774> [that] may fly עַל־ <WH5921> above הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth עַל־ <WH5921> above פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> in the open רְקִ֥יעַ <WH7549> firmament הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven

וַיִּבְרָ֣א <WH1254> created אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> הַתַּנִּינִ֖ם <WH8577> whales הַגְּדֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> great וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature הַֽחַיָּ֣ה ׀ <WH2416> and every living הָֽרֹמֶ֡שֶׂת <WH7430> that moveth אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which שָׁרְצ֨וּ <WH8317> brought forth abundantly הַמַּ֜יִם <WH4325> which the waters לְמִֽינֵהֶ֗ם <WH4327> after their kind וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every ע֤וֹף <WH5775> fowl כָּנָף֙ <WH3671> and every winged לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <WH4327> after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God כִּי־ <WH3588> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> that [it was] good

וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> them saying פְּר֣וּ <WH6509> Be fruitful וּרְב֗וּ <WH7235> and multiply וּמִלְא֤וּ <WH4390> and fill אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the waters בַּיַּמִּ֔ים <WH3220> in the seas וְהָע֖וֹף <WH5775> and let fowl יִ֥רֶב <WH7235> multiply בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth
וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> there was עֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> and the morning י֥וֹם <WH3117> day חֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> were the fifth פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> And God תּוֹצֵ֨א <WH3318> bring forth הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> Let the earth נֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> creature חַיָּה֙ <WH2416> the living לְמִינָ֔הּ <WH4327> after his kind בְּהֵמָ֥ה <WH929> cattle וָרֶ֛מֶשׂ <WH7431> and creeping thing וְחַֽיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> and beast אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְמִינָ֑הּ <WH4327> after his kind וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made אֱלֹהִים֩ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> חַיַּ֨ת <WH2416> the beast הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְמִינָ֗הּ <WH4327> after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and cattle לְמִינָ֔הּ <WH4327> after their kind וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and everything רֶ֥מֶשׂ <WH7431> and every thing that creepeth הָֽאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> upon the earth לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <WH4327> after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God כִּי־ <WH3588> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> that [it was] good

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God נַֽעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> Let us make אָדָ֛ם <WH120> man בְּצַלְמֵ֖נוּ <WH6754> in our image כִּדְמוּתֵ֑נוּ <WH1823> after our likeness וְיִרְדּוּ֩ <WH7287> and let them have dominion בִדְגַ֨ת <WH1710> over the fish הַיָּ֜ם <WH3220> of the sea וּבְע֣וֹף <WH5775> and over the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> of the air וּבַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and over the cattle וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and over all the earth וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> every הָרֶ֖מֶשׂ <WH7431> and over every creeping thing הָֽרֹמֵ֥שׂ <WH7430> that creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth

וַיִּבְרָ֨א <WH1254> created אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> So God אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> man בְּצַלְמ֔וֹ <WH6754> in his [own] image בְּצֶ֥לֶם <WH6754> in the image אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God בָּרָ֣א <WH1254> created אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> he him male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> and female בָּרָ֥א <WH1254> created אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed אֹתָם֮ <WH853> אֱלֹהִים֒ <WH430> And God וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶ֜ם אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> them and God פְּר֥וּ <WH6509> unto them Be fruitful וּרְב֛וּ <WH7235> and multiply וּמִלְא֥וּ <WH4390> and replenish אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְכִבְשֻׁ֑הָ <WH3533> and subdue it וּרְד֞וּ <WH7287> and have dominion בִּדְגַ֤ת <WH1710> over the fish הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> of the sea וּבְע֣וֹף <WH5775> and over the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the air וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> every חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> and over every living thing הָֽרֹמֶ֥שֶׂת <WH7430> that moveth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> And God הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold נָתַ֨תִּי <WH5414> I have given לָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֣שֶׂב ׀ <WH6212> you every herb זֹרֵ֣עַ <WH2232> bearing זֶ֗רַע <WH2233> seed אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> which [is] upon the face כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הָעֵ֛ץ <WH6086> and every tree אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בּ֥וֹ פְרִי־ <WH6529> in the which [is] the fruit עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> of a tree זֹרֵ֣עַ <WH2232> yielding זָ֑רַע <WH2233> seed לָכֶ֥ם יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> to you it shall be לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> for meat

וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> every חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> And to every beast הָ֠אָרֶץ <WH776> of the earth וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> every ע֨וֹף <WH5775> and to every fowl הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> of the air וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> every רוֹמֵ֣שׂ <WH7430> and to every thing that creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בּוֹ֙ נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> any חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> age אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> thing יֶ֥רֶק <WH3418> [I have given] every green עֵ֖שֶׂב <WH6212> herb לְאָכְלָ֑ה <WH402> for meat וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and it was כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> every thing that עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> he had made וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and behold [it was] very וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was עֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> and the morning י֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשִּׁשִּֽׁי׃ <WH8345> were the sixth פ
